website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you need a round brush for short to medium-length hair; otherwise, competitors are stronger and are less likely to get stuck in long hair.
pros: Earns praise for delivering similar results to larger nano thermal round brushes, but at 1.3 inches in circumference, it's a great choice for shorter lengths
Has natural boar bristles and a slim handle that is easy to grip
cons: If you have thin or long, coarse hair, you may have a difficult time getting all of your hair unwound from the barrel
Some complaints of the barrel breaking off the handle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I picked this round brush over the million other options on Amazon because it was mid-priced and the tines did not have little balls on the end of them (these have made detangling awful on my old brush). The brush is a winner! It is so lightweight that I can spend more time doing a blowout. The tines have two lengths that easily grab hair and hold, but they don’t cause tangles. The brush heats up a LOT as you blow dry. That’s great for setting hair but ouchie on fingers. I only did it once....! Getting this same brush for my mom and my sister. Not sure I can wait for their birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Kalatraza

customer_reviews.title: Quality of handle needs dramatic improvement
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this functionality of this brush. So much so that when the handle broke, I purchased another. Third time I have purchased and the handle does not hope up to everyday use. Stay away until the manufacturer fixes this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I am no stylist. However, this brush is so easy to work with. My hair looks like it was styled by someone who knew what she was doing! As my technique remained the same, the only difference between one day and the next was the brush used...THIS brush.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wood-Martin

customer_reviews.title: If you have fine hair, get a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/17/18: Suprent contacted me after reading my review and offered a refund or replacement. I opted for a replacement with a larger size barrel. They sent it immediately and I am very happy with it! The right size made all the difference. Great customer service. I followed the length guidelines for ordering the size of my brush and unfortunately I find the barrel to be too small and it tangles my hair. Also, the smaller bristles fall out.
customer_reviews.author: IDmh

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on May 8 and the brush arrived on May 22. The quality of the brush is excellent. My hair dries quickly and looks shiny and healthy when it is finished. I originally bought the 1.8 inch (from another Amazon vendor) and then found the 1.3 inch here. I like having two sizes for different looks when I blow dry. The brush is lightweight and the handle is easy to hold. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Food Lover

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: I now have 6 of these brushes in different sizes. Very good product and makes your hair look smooth like silk. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: carrera4

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED company responded and sent me a new brush. It actually feels different from the last one, much stronger. Handle broke off about 6 months after I purchased. I tried messaging the vendor through the Amazon tool but the email wasn't valid.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: broke!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second brush that I ordered. I thought it was just a fluke that the first brush broke off where the handle meets the brush head. I liked the brush so I purchased this second one. It also broke. Same place. I didn't purchase a third!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A

customer_reviews.title: It is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I like nothing about this brush. Bristles falling out profusely. Very stiff bristles and very hard on scalp. I would not even consider using it and I don’t even have sensitive scalp. It arrived today and it is going back today.
customer_reviews.author: llindalu

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice for making your hair feel softer once it is already dry, but this brush is useless for blow drying as it does not grab any hair other than a very small top layer.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: mine had broke, but they offered to replace it for me which is nice. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: lisa massey

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 2 weeks, then it WILL break
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it left my hair shiny, dried it quickly (although I have since purchased another brush which dries it much faster and doesn't pull), and the handle was nice and "grippy". The other side of the nice "grippy" handle is that it pulled your hair and hair kept on getting caught in between the handle and brush head. They need to seal this. It is a plastic handle inside and not glued very well. This is the second time a brush like this one has broken, both for the same reason of the crappy handle. Don't waste your money trying cheap hairbrushes and go support your local beauty supply store where you can return it if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Sent this brush back immediately. Quality is very poor, cheap plastic, and the bristles arrived smashed. There are no tips on the nylon bristles and I think it would damage my hair. Very disappointed and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NADIA Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to use with my hair dryer. All other brushes that I have used could not stand up to the heat, but not this brush! I have used it for quite some time now, and it is still in the same condition as the day I bought it, and it works great as far as helping to straighten my curly hair. I love that it has vents in the handle also, in order to let the heat of the dryer circulate through all of the bristles. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Mattei

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Alas, after many faithful years my old brush died, so I had to find a new brush. I looked for several types but didn't find one that I felt comfortable to use with my very Celtic-curly hair - until this ceramic and bristle brush. Whether my hair is wet or dry, it feels comfortable and doesn't pull my hair. Also, it's a comfortable fit in the hand. I highly recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: EABaldwin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair smooth
customer_reviews.text: works great. easy to use, keeps hair smooth. Came quickly - post office delivered it on a Sunday before Xmas!!
customer_reviews.author: lori harp

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few weeks ago and have used it several times and so has my sister and daughter. All of us have had great results. It beats blow drying AND THEN styling your hair when you can do both at once. It really tames my hair and keeps it from being frizzy. If I want to add more curl sometimes then I just add a few curls with my curling iron. I am a 65 year old woman with hair past my shoulders and it just is a tad heavy for me but I’ve adapted and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: haywhitmom

customer_reviews.title: Magical brush!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I have thin, fried, nasty hair. I straighten everyday bc I’m stuck in that vicious cycle where my hair is so nasty I need to straighten, but it’s nasty bc I straighten. This brush just smoothed out my hair, like magic. If the weather was good, I wouldn’t even straighten. But bc I love in 100% humidity I’ll straighten but not nearly as much! And less on roots. Hair does not get stuck on the handle when twisting...that’s my biggest pet peeve with brushes and this doesn’t do that! Grabs the hair perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Beaudry

customer_reviews.title: styles perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good brush for a while. This brush is fantastic. I have shoulder length hair, lots of layers and thin. I am able to get a perfect curl and fuller hair style with this brush. I love the handle with the plastic grip as it helps me hold the brush much better while styling. Would definitely recommend and very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Boar Hair brush, but not a boring style!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brush! It's natural boar hair not only helps the shine if it hair but it feels good on my scalp. At first it felt too rough, so I just eased up on the pressure. It is fantastic! The brush head of the 2" size warmed up as I blow dried my hair, giving a perfect natural blend I wanted in my Bob style haircut. My bangs blew perfectly. It has always been a struggle, but this brush fixed it. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: ladibug40

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: It feels great brushing your hair and does a good job styling when blow-drying your hair. I love the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. Unlike most roll brushes this brush doesn’t stab your head . Works great and no pain involved
customer_reviews.author: chris m martin jr

customer_reviews.title: Holds hair perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this brush: It's really huge when I compare it to most brushes on the market but because of it's size it holds so much more hair (and doesn't let it fall!) which lets me finish blow drying a lot quicker! Also, the hair stays on the brush and doesn't slide off after 5 seconds...
customer_reviews.author: Louisa May Alcott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to create body a short hairstyle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just had my very long straight hair cut into a cute face shaping bob. None of my flat paddle brushes for long hair will do. I was so pleased with the quality of this brush, it’s the perfect size to create the body and curl in that I need. My hair dries in a few minutes and the boar bristles make it very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyeress

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but....
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice brush, but too many bristles. It doesn't brush smoothly and easily through my hair, and my hair is on the fine, thin side. I think actually went through & cut out some of the bristles. It took a while & I probably wouldn't do it again, but now I can move it smoothly through my hair while blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for smoothing curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush, great handle! I like the fact it came in a sealed plastic wrap. I have medium length curly hair and this brush does a nice smooth blowout!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Always breaks on me...
customer_reviews.text: I have brought this brush several times only because it has a good feel and does smooth out and add shine to your hair -- but at some point it always breaks.. This one is only 1 week old. The handle definitely needs to be strengthened.
customer_reviews.author: J B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest for fine hair and inexperienced enduser.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was drying and curling at the same time - but left in too long evidently - didn't think I did - but started to smell burnt hair. Ugh! Maybe if I had more experience - would not have been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: 55fordlady

customer_reviews.title: dont recommend at
customer_reviews.text: cheap material, some of the bristles were torn. not pleasant brushing your head with it, very hard. dont recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for shorter hair!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is easy to hold and use. It is the right size for the length of my hair - which I would classify as layered and short (3 inches below the ears). My hair is smooth after drying with the brush and requires very little flat ironing after.
customer_reviews.author: sugar baby

customer_reviews.title: No more messy hair.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, and she is impressed at how well it brushes through, and detangles well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush so much that this is the second I have purchased. It is easy to use, comfortable in my hand and I love the way my hair looks. It give my hair a slight wave and is smooth. The first brush lasted 2 years and the handle started to loosen. I bought an Epic brush that looked similar and cost twice as much but I can't pull it thru my hair so I repurchased this one and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush. The diameter of it is big enough so that my hair dries fast. It's comfortable to hold while drying my hair. I'm noticing that some of the bristles are falling out, but I'm hoping that it'll only be just a few of them. Edited to say that I contacted Suprent, and they’re sending me a replacement. Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: I have thin hair and it made the frizz worse.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. I have thin hair and it made the frizz worse.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality brush
customer_reviews.text: The bristles don't fall out or bend. I feel like it's good for my hair. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Soderstrom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for a poor quality brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush based on the generally positive reviews to replace a brush that broke after almost 6 years of use. I followed the instructions for which size to buy (based on hair length and texture) and landed on this particular brush... which broke after 4 uses in the first month. Thinking this was an exception, I replaced the brush and the second brush broke on the FIRST use. The brush head just clean separated from the body of the brush. Now I'm returning this a second time and plan to buy a more reliable brush replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the larger sized roller brush a while back and loved it. But needed a smaller one for my now short hair. Does a great job of blowing out and adding some volume to my fine hair. Love the magnet in the handle so I can hang it instead of throwing in a basket or drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!! I finally purchased a new round brush and chose Suprent because I have used their flat brush for the last 2 years and love it! I was beyond happy with this new round brush. The first time I used it, I was back to a smooth style after blow drying. My hair was frizz free. It works well with hair dryer. The brush is comfortable to hold and easy to use. I’m so happy with this purchase!! Thank you fir getting me back to smooth hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. Works great with straightening my wavy hair. Very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Helped this beginner to master blow outs
customer_reviews.text: I was wary about using a round brush because I have very thick hair and this looks like the sort of brush from my childhood that got stuck in my hair and would take an hour to remove. Surprisingly, I really love it. It was my first time trying to master a blow out. By the 2nd try, I got the technique down and the brush goes through my hair well (just have to take smaller sections and go slow at first). The brush heats up very well and doesn't pull out my hair. The handle has good grip also.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this brush is awesome. Going from a drugstore Goody round brush to this brush is a drastic improvement, and the price is only a tiny bit more! My hair dries faster and is smoother, softer and shinier. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush over a year ago and I have to say it works perfectly. I use it to blow out my hair and the results are amazing. After blow-drying, my hair is soft, manageable and free from tangles. However, make sure you clean it out in between blow dries as the air flow will not be as smooth if the hair is blocking the holes (same with any brush).
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Blower/Styler!
customer_reviews.text: This product is super fast in drying your hair! The fact that it just doesn't blow hot air constantly (it cools down and then warms up) really helps and with all the extra gadgets that come with, you can style your hair beautifully. The round brush also helps in getting a clean, smooth look. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Arra Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for handling medium length hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have tested a few brushes for my hair and had problems with size or handle and even stretching my hair out and they have been horrible. I finally found the right brush. It’s so easy to work with... no tangling and nice smooth movements to get the look I need. Handle and brush size perfect. I’d definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: JBH

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth and shiny hair!
customer_reviews.text: So I have trouble doing blow outs on my clients who have super curly and frizzy hair. I can never get their hair smooth, so my friend recommended that I try a round brush with boar bristles, and I'm so glad I listened. I got to use it today and my clients were so happy and impressed on how shiny and silky their hair looked. Definitely recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tori M

customer_reviews.title: Great for grown out bangs
customer_reviews.text: Finally. I needed a brush to style my growing out blunt bangs. They’re right below my eyes and this brush is PERFECT for sweeping them into the perfect curtain bang. So happy I finally found a brush that holds on to my hair. With other brushes my hair would just slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Lamonté

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: When i received it, many of the bristles were bent from the shipping but i didn't really mind. It's also a very wide brush so if you have shorter hair and you are trying to use it for blow drying and volumizing it's a little too big for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Byrone

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever for styling with blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like that it stops my hair from being frizzy! This is lightweight, easy to hold, and just the right diameter for my shoulder-length hair. It seems to distribute the heat from the blow dryer well, so the hair gets smooth quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi  B.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a 2 year review for this product. I love this brush so much and had to come back and leave a review. I have long hair upto my hips. Before I bought this brush, I went through multiple brushes. This brush however is the best brush I have sued for my hair. It does not entangle hair and is so easy to use. I absolutely love this brush and recommend to anyone especially people with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: nitzk

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, only a fault of my own as I didn’t fully read the dimensions. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Best brush EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many brushes . Most of them were given away because they did not help with frizzies and straightening but this brush checked all the boxes. The handle is great. Easy to use. Hair looked great too. Love Love Love it..
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush, and it helped with drying my hair pretty fast. However, after the first use I saw a ton of brush bristles on the floor where I was drying my hair. So many that I thought someone had cut their hair and asked my husband who cut their hair in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pull my hair out!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a brush like this & had bought 4 others that either my hair was blown out before it was dry or the brush caught in my hair & returned them all. Then I ordered this brush & was pleasantly surprised that I really liked it. I think it really works &would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mamasueMI

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair quickly, smoothly, and with ease!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It helped cut down my drying time, and left my hair beautifully smooth and silky at the end. I am not used to having "boar" bristles in my round brush, so it did take some getting use to. But once I got the hang of it, it works like a dream! 100% recommend. Edit 1/3/20: The plastic bristles of this brush have melted and deformed. I would not recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McPeak

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: My mom didn’t have a proper round brush for blow drying her hair and she blow dries her hair all the time. I helped her look for one and we found this one. The price is right and the quality is there. It’s a great brush!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail I.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, hair doesn’t get tangled
customer_reviews.text: Just used it today, so happy with my purchase. Easy to hold. Round brushes typically get stuck in my hair when I’m in a hurry, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justeen

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this brush, but the dang handle fell off after about 3 months. Annoying. And there's a long screw in the middle that won't align properly now so I can't glue it back together. UGH
customer_reviews.author: Erin - TN

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update: Was contacted by the seller and they worked with me to get the right size brush. Much easier to use so far. This brush isn’t easy to use. The bristles are too short and don’t grab my hair well. Not sure if it is the size of the brush I purchased or what.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Raker

customer_reviews.title: Best Styling Brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought the SUPRENT Blowout Nano Thermic Ceramic & Ionic Round Barrel Hair Brush with Boar Bristle, thinking this was just a regular drying brush, just with a lot of adjectives, but WOW, I am impressed with the results. Drying this brush makes my hair seem like it's been professionally styled. I gather the thermic, ionic boar bristle thing is what makes my usually fine, limp hair seem super thick and super shiny. I am hugely impressed with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: dyan

customer_reviews.title: A must-have to get a salon look from home...
customer_reviews.text: My mother had a similar brush, which I loved. I bought one that I thought was the same, but it was cheaply made that the bristles fell out after only a couple uses and my hair isn’t even that thick. So I was on a mission! This product made it so easy to blowout my hair straight and add just the right amount of volume. I’ve finally found a round brush that helps to minimize the frizz because of the extra fine bristles. A great find...you won’t know how long you went without it! A must-have!
customer_reviews.author: cgp85

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and hold, works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. It's my favorite of all time! Easy to hold. Brushes my hair easily and gets knots out with no effort. It also curls my hair easily with the blow dryer! Thank you for this brush.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t waste the money
customer_reviews.text: Waited u til I judged the brush for month before writing a review. My hair is fine so I was hoping this brush would add shine and maybe some volume but it really did neither. I gave it 2 stars only because I had no complaints with the brush grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a new review about the manufacturer of this brush! I was not happy with the brush (for me) as stated originally but the manufacturer refunded my purchase price and has been amazing to deal with. I should have said originally that I have fine hair and a lot of it! It was very difficult for me to style with this brush but for someone else it would probably be amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brush I have ordered. The first one I used it for 2 yrs and the handle was a bit loose so ordered another one. I use it every time I wash my hair to style my hair and works perfect for me. It’s the perfect curls And bounce I need. I would Order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Swehim

customer_reviews.title: Good number of bristles to hold thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Because I have thick hair, many of the round brushes I have bought in the past don't work for me. Forget those ones with the little balls on the ends! The many boar bristles let me pull my hair as I dry it but don't become tangled in it. What more could you want? Seems to heat up well too! I would recommend if you have been disappointed in other round brushes.
customer_reviews.author: kcprek

customer_reviews.title: Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush! I have fine hair and it really helps me to style and hold onto my hair while styling. The brush is still gentle though because of the boar hair. My hair feels softer and has much more volume. Plus, it's affordable. I'd recommend to anyone looking for a great styling brush and especially people with fine to medium hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Skoczen

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush !
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I've ever purchased ! The natural boar bristles are perfect for my extremely curly hair. I get bouncy curls without the frizz . The ceramic coating and ionic technology leaves my hair silky and shiny for those day when I do a straight blow out !
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BARREL BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: This is most likely the best boar bristle barrel brush I have purchased as it does firmly hold hair in place while rotating as I dry my hair. I have also noticed significantly reduced frizz which is pretty much common for gray hair...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The simple pleasure of a new hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's just a hairbrush but after cleaning off clumps of hair from my old one, I thought it wa time to get a new one. This one just feels so much softer yet is still sturdy and makes it faster to dry my hair, which is shinier, straighter and NO CLUMPS.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Not for bleach/blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush actually works great on creating volume when using the blow dryer and it doesn't pull your hair like other brushes but I will rated 3 stars since it broke my hair off. So if your not a natural blonde don't buy. Highly recommended for any other hair color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Received this brush today and was very pleased with it. I have fairly thick and wavy hair that I wear in a straight bob. It decreased my drying time.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The brush was used!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box (which was intact and sealed correctly), the sealed bag the brush came in was open. When I took the brush out, it was full of long blonde hairs. Gross! Returned for a refund, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan M

customer_reviews.title: Check your size! Amazing brush for the right fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brush but the size I ordered for my hair is just a bit too awkward for my hands. I still use it because I love the way my hair feels but when this one needs a replacement I will get a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife was having her hair done and asked what kind of brush the hairdresser was using because she loved it. I took a picture of it and ordered one from Amazon. My wife says it's the best brush she's ever used and makes blow drying her hair much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better handle
customer_reviews.text: I think it would be a great brush if the handle had a raised grip. Despite the material feeling grippy the handle slips through my hand when attempting to get maximum tension to smooth hair. It needs a hump to stop slippages
customer_reviews.author: D. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Helps with frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb for my blowouts and I really love it! It feels expensive and it leaves my hair looking awesome. I have curly hair, so when I do my blowouts my hair can get really frizzy, but this comb definitely helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my longer hair. The open style helps my hair dry on the first pass. Leaves it just shiny enough and minimal frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D

customer_reviews.title: Heard a lot of good reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is not bad, but it is not the best brush I have had. I wish it was bigger. Not so easy for long hair. quality is good. Handle is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mehrnaz

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Honestly used to take me about 40 minutes to blow dry my hair bc I have long thick hair. It took me 20 minutes with this brush. I love it. I’ve read a lot how for my hair I should buy bigger round brushes but I went w my gut and picked this one bc I wanted better curls at the end. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jeannina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size of the brush is perfect for the length of my hair which is below shoulder length, medium thickness. I wanted a large brush for blow dry and this brush is just what I was looking for. The price was the best I found.
customer_reviews.author: Belona

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping but
customer_reviews.text: This brush looks great and its seems like a very good quality but from the first use I found the black bristles are falling out and the handle is not comfortable and it’s hurting my palm for a curly thick hair like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Alaa Allaf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have curly wavy hair so I usually just let my hair air dry. I'm not very good at blow drying my hair but have a new style that requires it. This brush works really well for me and dries my hair very quickly. I would recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: lwassy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely takes some getting used to if your knew at using one, but works great in unison with blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Spend money and get the good hair tool
customer_reviews.text: This came in a variety of sizes. I bought one smaller roll brush for me, and a large one for my daughter in Seattle. Can't say anything but GREAT things about this ceramic brush! Little pricey when you buy more than one....but hey, splurge, they're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works through my hair perfectly. Gives it good volume without any static.
customer_reviews.author: adam atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice brush. The first time I used it with the hair dryer, my hair came out so soft. It also has a magnet in the handle so I can hang it from magnetic surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hagge

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brushes. I have 3 different ones. I use them every day. They were exactly as seller explained. They arrived quickly. I give the product and the seller 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this brush will last
customer_reviews.text: The actual brush is great. BUT every time I use it the smaller black bristles fall out all over the place. Just not sure this brush is going to make it past a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Man

customer_reviews.title: Already broke after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this up until yesterday when the head broke off. I am a bit surprised at the quality of this product. I don't have thick hair so I am blaming this on poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: So smoothing and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think a brush could make that much of a difference in how my hair would look after blow drying with it. I guess I thought it had more to do with technique and the dryer...but this brush is a game changer!!! My hair is so much smoother and softer. I feel like everyone with long hair needs this brush. My hair is long and wavy and frizzy, but this brush combats the waves and frizz like no other!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great hair drying/straightening tool
customer_reviews.text: All I can is WOW! I hadn’t bought a new brush in awhile, and I was hesitant to buying one online. But I got this one for it’s one piece design and core that can be heated so high. I did my hair yesterday and even with the humidity, it was soooo sleek! I was thoroughly impressed! My husband even commented on it! 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing brush
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had a love hate relationship with round brushes, as they tend to get tangled in my thick hair. This one does too, but perhaps it’s just user error. Even when it does, I can pull it through. It leaves my hair smooth, but not as wavy as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Bangs!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is perfect to style your bangs with. Very sturdy and easy to use. Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my hair not be so frizzy. I do wish it wasn’t quite as big around, but overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: NOT CERAMIC - CHEAP PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: NOT CERAMIC as advertised. It is CHEAP PLASTIC. Returning. False advertising. Quite angry about this deception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ll pass
customer_reviews.text: Not for all types of hair.. works but not well for blow drying straight natural hair
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great drying/styling brush
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lightweight, non-tangling brush when drying/styling hair. Was looking for styling brush that could also add volume when drying hair. Got it all in this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: Needed desperately to change out my brush that I use to blow dry my curly hair straight. After lots of research and reading reviews I chose the SUPRENT round brush. Very happy so far with it's capabilities. The vents through the brush help reduce the dry time and the handle is comfortable to hold. I am also liking the bristles so far and they seem like they will stand up to the high heat of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Pasquariello

customer_reviews.title: Good brush but handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this brush, but the handle broke, so that’s pretty disappointing. I used it 3-4 times per week on average, and my hair is thin but I have a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: HokieJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good airflow in a brush
customer_reviews.text: I had previously had a brush nearly identical to this. This one is a tad bit lighter and being that my fine hair takes a while to dry + needing to add stretch to my curls when drying, the lighter brush makes it easier on my hand and arm. Takes a good 20 minutes to blowdry, so the better the tools, the less straining to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A DeMattia

product_meta.title: SUPRENT Round Brush with Natural Boar Bristles,Nano Thermic Ceramic Coating& Ionic Roller Hairbrush for Blow Drying, Curling&Straightening, Volume&Shine (2.4" & Barrel 1.3")
feature_bullets: 【100% NATURAL BOAR BRISTLE 】: The natural boar bristle round brush is extremely effective in pulling your hair’s natural oils down to the ends of your hair from the roots, so your locks look extremely shiny and smooth.

【IONIC TECHNOLOGY】: Add negative ions to your hair as you blow-dry to reduce frizz and static. Make your hair looks smoother and shinier, which can be particularly helpful if you have thick, coarse, or textured hair.
【UPGRADED ERGONOMIC HANDLE】: Easier to hold and can help prevent hand fatigue.
【CERAMIC BARREL ROUND BRUSH】: Retain heat well but provide a gentle, even amount that helps the styling and drying process without damaging your hair.
【SUPRENT 12 Months Warranty】: 5 years experience focusing on beard trimmer products, SUPRENT provides perfect service for >100k customers in US & Europe every year.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
